I stand corrected KS I didn't realize I was in the presence of a 
history, geography, and transformer buff.
Either way it was in the USA, not Tibet.
(People with brains at this site? I am impressed.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Cyber, you're wrong.  The Ark crashed into Mt. St. Hillary in 
Oregon. NOT 
> Washington State.  And somehow with magic, the Maximal leader moved 
the Ark 
> to Tibet...don't ask me how, but Hillary, not Helens.  'Cause for 
one, the 
> Autobots awoke in '84, not 1980 when Helens blew, so, sorry, you're 
wrong)
